extracted_playbook.title: Update Device Firmware
extracted_playbook.description: Update the device to the latest firmware version to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict network access to the device to prevent unauthorized access.

extracted_playbook.title: Disconnect Device from Internet
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure the device is not directly connected to the internet to enhance security.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Unused TCP/UDP Ports
extracted_playbook.description: Disable any unused TCP/UDP ports to reduce potential attack vectors.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Web-Based Management Ports
extracted_playbook.description: Disable web-based management ports 80/443 after the configuration phase to prevent unauthorized web access.
